page.title: 17FISH POND FARM USSELBY
page.content: This 1280 acre area consists of woodland, grassland and three, well stocked fishing ponds. The owner is trying to establish family fishing with facilities for both the fisherman and his family. He provides an area for caravans to park, also bed & breakfast accomadation in his farm house. He also has stables with several horses available for riding free of charge by the fisherman's families. He has erected a barn near the tench pond with pool tables, snacks and drinks for the fishermen to use during the quiet times. Monthly and yearly competitions are held for the heaviest Tench and the heaviest fish caught. The ponds are surrounded by beautiful coutryside and it makes an excellent place for a good days fishing.
